desc: Our Youth Greatness Within and remind them 2 always, “DREAM THE POSSIBLE DREAM” 4 Their Lives!! Our Signature Glow in the Dark Logo Represents the, “LIGHT WITHIN YOU” and to remember 2 “LYLS” = “LET YOUR LIGHT SHINE”!

layout.text: Our educational and charitable mission is to inspire and motivate people to "Dream the Possible Dream for their lives" through hard work, dedication and a relentless drive to succeed through higher education
